# Sentence case failing fixture

## Title case instead of sentence case

# Title Case Heading Should Fail <!-- âŒ -->

# This Is not correct <!-- âŒ -->

# Why This Should Fail <!-- âŒ -->

# Low-Cost Solutions For Small Teams <!-- âŒ -->

# How to use Api Keys <!-- âŒ -->

# A Quick Guide To Markdown <!-- âŒ -->

# Getting Started With Testing <!-- âŒ -->

## Improper capitalization of acronyms or brand names

# API Is Not Responding <!-- âŒ -->

# Using JSON and Html with CSS <!-- âŒ -->

# Node.js-Based tools <!-- âŒ -->

# Should fail: Nodejs version 18 <!-- âŒ -->

# When to use 'Git' vs GitHub <!-- âŒ -->

# ReactJS Components For Beginners <!-- âŒ -->

# Differences Between HTTP And Https <!-- âŒ -->

## Inconsistent casing of proper nouns

# Visiting paris during summer <!-- âŒ -->

# Visiting paris in the spring <!-- âŒ -->

# Tools from github <!-- âŒ -->

# learning From socrates <!-- âŒ -->

# Trip to the andes mountains <!-- âŒ -->

# Exploring japanese aesthetics <!-- âŒ -->

## MixedCase and shouting

# FIRST example of poor heading case <!-- âŒ -->

# SYSTEM FAILURE DETECTED <!-- âŒ -->

# First word Has mixedCase <!-- âŒ -->

# UpdateUserProfile Not Working <!-- âŒ -->

# ThisWillFail Miserably <!-- âŒ -->

## Improper handling of lowercase acronyms

# css <!-- âŒ --> <!-- intentionally lowercase single word -->

# api <!-- âŒ -->

# json <!-- âŒ -->

# npm <!-- âœ… -->

# cli tools <!-- âŒ -->

## Leading verbs unnecessarily capitalized

# Using the CLI with Node.js 20 <!-- âŒ -->

# using the CLI with Node.js 20 <!-- âŒ -->

# Adding New Features With Git <!-- âŒ -->

# Creating A Pull Request <!-- âŒ -->

## Phrases or idioms not sentence cased

# Don't Panic <!-- âŒ -->

# don't panic <!-- âŒ -->

# Let It Be <!-- âŒ -->

# Keep Calm And Carry On <!-- âŒ -->

# Thinking Outside The Box <!-- âŒ -->
